messages.content: ComfyUI-APISR is an unofficial implementation of APISR for ComfyUI, which is a super-resolution model specifically for anime images.
What are the two official models supported by ComfyUI-APISR?
ComfyUI-APISR supports two official models: 2x_APISR_RRDB_GAN_generator and 4x_APISR_GRL_GAN_generator. These models need to be manually downloaded and placed in the /ComfyUI/models/apisr directory.
What types of media does ComfyUI-APISR support for upscaling?
ComfyUI-APISR supports both image and video upscaling.
What are the two modes available for video upscaling in ComfyUI-APISR?
ComfyUI-APISR provides two modes for video upscaling: Batch mode for high video memory and Lterative mode for low video memory.
ComfyUI-APISR can be installed using the ComfyUI Manager or manually by cloning the repository and installing the required dependencies.
What is the purpose of the 'APISR ModelLoader' node in ComfyUI-APISR?
The 'APISR ModelLoader' node in ComfyUI-APISR is used to load the APISR models, which are required for upscaling images and videos.
What is the recommended workflow for using ComfyUI-APISR?
The recommended workflows for using ComfyUI-APISR are 'V1.0 APISR img or video Batch' for batch processing and 'V1.0 APISR img or video Lterative' for iterative processing.
